T=input()
while T:
    T-=1
    inv=0
    N=list(str(input()))
    length=len(N)
    for i in range(0,length):
        N[i]=int(N[i])
    i=0
    while i<length-1 and N[i+1]==N[i]:
        i+=1
    if i==length-1:
        print 'valid'
        continue
    if N[i+1]>N[i]:
        while i<length-1 and N[i+1]>=N[i]:
            i+=1
        if i==length-1:
            print 'valid'
            continue
        elif N[i+1]<N[i]:
            print 'invalid'
            continue
    elif N[i+1]<N[i]:
        while i<length-1 and N[i+1]<=N[i]:
            i+=1
        if i==length-1:
            print 'valid'
            continue
        elif N[i+1]>N[i]:
            print 'invalid'
            continue
